Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the qualifications to hold the position of assistant county attorney in the county of Rockland
Summary: Allows a non-resident to hold the position of assistant county attorney in the county of Rockland.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to qualification to hold the position of assistant county attorney in the county of Rockland
